entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is feeling contaminated and tainted.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who did not reply to his question.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who suggested they need a safe place to hide.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are the enemies of Harry and his friends.

relationships.description: Harry asked Hermione a question, but she did not reply.
Harry and Ron were discussing their situation and what they should do next.
The Death Eaters are the enemies of Harry, who is trying to hide from them.
